# influxdb-v2_authorization (Resource)



## Example Usage

```terraform
locals {
  org_id = "example_org_id"
  bucket_id = "example_bucket_id"
}

resource "influxdb-v2_authorization" "example_authorization" {
  org_id      = local.org_id
  description = "Example description"
  status      = "active"
  permissions {
    action = "read"
    resource {
      id     = local.bucket_id
      org_id = local.org_id
      type   = "buckets"
    }
  }
  permissions {
    action = "write"
    resource {
      id     = local.bucket_id
      org_id = local.org_id
      type   = "buckets"
    }
  }
}
```

### Required

- `permissions` (Block Set, Min: 1) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--permissions))

### Optional

- `status` (String)

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
- `token` (String, Sensitive)
- `user_id` (String)
- `user_org_id` (String)

## Import

Import is supported using the following syntax:

```shell
terraform import influxdb-v2_authorization.example_authorization <AUTH_ID>
```
